dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2239 IH: Stop Court-Packing Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cotton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To reduce the number of Federal judgeships for the U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Stop Court-Packing Act .

section.header: Reduction of Federal judgeships for U.S. Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit
section.text:
The table contained in
section 44(a) of title 28, United States Code, is amended in the item relating to the District of Columbia circuit court of appeals, by striking 11 and inserting 8.
